title: Unfair penalisation
body:
How is it fair that I Que up for ranked dynamic Que by myself and I am trying to climb the ranks but I come across two idiots that chose out of meta bot laners (talon, Azir) which forces me to have to not lock in because I dont want to play with people that are not taking the game serious and are just trolling, but I am the one that gets penalized for it. Its absolutely absurd, im sitting here now because I am currently on ranked Que cool down for 30 minutes, with -13lp because this has happened twice in my last two champion selects that I am near on forced into dodging because of other peoples poor choices and lack of taking ranked Que serious. Its not fair, and it honestly makes me hate this game and its toxic trolling community that comes with it. 
reevaluate the way you penalize people dodging from champion select, its absurd. (Currently GOLD 5)

replies.body: It sucks when that happens but there isn't much that can be done. I had my 2nd game of the day with the jungler not taking smite and not building any jingle items. Lost a promo in one of those games because of it.

Hey Marshland-

I definitely know how that can feel. Riot are very good at telling if it is peoples intention to troll and ruin the game for others. Likleyhood is that if they are, other people are reporting them. You should be too. This is the best way to get their accounts fully reviewed.
Make sure not to dodge or lash out at them or case negativity, just do your best, remember even know it may mean a lot, it is just a video game. Remember to report them and mute them too.

Hope I somewhat helped :) :3
~Reported4Verbal~ OCE~  Always Happy To Help! :)
ARAM Main! In SR, 
Main Support Lulu, Sona, Twisted Fate, Vladimir 
Fill Except Top & Jungle

It doesn't get any better trust me... the matchmaking system doesn't sort the feeders/trolls/afk's from the rest. I had 10 games of league in the past 2 days ranked in Silver, and literally all 10 games, I have had feeders, people picking rediculous champs in roles ( Heimer jg, Xerath adc) and because of players feeling the need to troll and the tribunal doing absolutely nothing ( Reported a player quite a few days ago for feeding then afk'ing... saw him again in one of my games doing the same thing ) I have lost 2 divisions. I would queue dodge, but how can you tell what people are gonna be like in game? Riot really needs to reevaluate the mmr in lower elo's. as its the golds and belows that just wanna ruin everyone elses gaming experience. Right now Heroes of the Storm seems the better choice of moba.

If you have think that is unfair I suggest you send a support ticket to riot games. As long as you didn't express how you felt in chat with a negative attitude, you should not be penalized but others will think differently since you have been dodging and wasting a lot of time for others

Sorry to hear about the experience, but running an out of meta lane comp isn't grounds to leave or afk, you would have lost that LP regardless of playing or not but they could have made something of it. 

Yes it does sound a little iffy but don't throw people under the bus because they're doing something different.

Real shame,
Some people want to troll around in ranked and not normals to ruin others days luckily you usually won't encounter these types of people :)
They also are pretty toxic folk as well

Yo Marshland 

I would suggest that when you get any people like these in games, you continue to play to the best of your ability and help out the team mates that are actually trying. 
(Good karma will come to you this way :p)
Also at the end of the game be sure to report them and include detailed description. If they recieve a lot of reports rito will start coming down on them quite hard.

I hope I have helped a little bit. :)

man I feel your pain normal are for the idiots who want to muck about and I personal make no secret of my opinion on these scum bags and also riot plz fix the potatoes you have dealing with reports cos this is crazy so many toxic players get away with this crap and WE get punished for it

the Toxic trolls in this game are really becoming out of hand, yet Riot still do nothing about them. We get no feedback from reports.

Dodging in Champ select is our only way to fight back against the Toxic trolls.
